He also shared his thoughts on his son Aryaveer's cricket career, emphasizing the importance of handling pressure.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/cricket-dont-make-decision-when-youre-emotional-virender-sehwag-reveals-sachin-tendulkar-stopped-him-from-odi-retirement-in-2007-08/articleshow/123308684.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/cricket-dont-make-decision-when-youre-emotional-virender-sehwag-reveals-sachin-tendulkar-stopped-him-from-odi-retirement-in-2007-08/articleshow/123308684.cms</guid><pubDate>Thu, 14 Aug 2025 21:56:06 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="21138" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123308896,imgsize-21138.cms"/></item><item><title>GitHub CEO Thomas Dohmke: Won’t allow employees to refuse using GitHub</title><description><![CDATA[GitHub CEO Thomas Dohmke mandated the use of the platform for all employees, emphasizing its integral role in the company culture. Meet Arjun Tendulkar's future in-law</title><description><![CDATA[Arjun Tendulkar, son of Sachin Tendulkar, is reportedly engaged to Saaniya Chandok, granddaughter of Mumbai businessman Ravi Ghai. The families have yet to confirm the engagement, which reportedly took place on Wednesday. Saaniya's grandfather, Ravi Ghai, heads the Graviss Group, a prominent hospitality and food-and-beverage company with a 70-year legacy in the industry.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/the-maharajah-of-ice-cream-how-ravi-ghai-connects-arjun-tendulkar-to-a-sweet-legacy/articleshow/123301914.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/the-maharajah-of-ice-cream-how-ravi-ghai-connects-arjun-tendulkar-to-a-sweet-legacy/articleshow/123301914.cms</guid><pubDate>Thu, 14 Aug 2025 16:14:39 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="28428" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123302540,imgsize-28428.cms"/></item><item><title>Watch: Canadian man's rant over Punjabi music goes viral; sparks debate online</title><description><![CDATA[]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/rest-of-world/canadian-man-slams-city-after-indian-family-plays-loud-music-at-barrie-beach-claims-was-once-fined-for-playing-guitar-watch/articleshow/123302209.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/rest-of-world/canadian-man-slams-city-after-indian-family-plays-loud-music-at-barrie-beach-claims-was-once-fined-for-playing-guitar-watch/articleshow/123302209.cms</guid><pubDate>Thu, 14 Aug 2025 16:03:47 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI WORLD DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="758087" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123302248,imgsize-758087.cms"/></item></channel></rss>

    <item>
      <title><![CDATA[India-China direct flights resumption likely to boost trade, tourism and economic ties]]></title>
      <link><![CDATA[https://www.cnbctv18.com/business/aviation/india-china-flights-resumption-economic-ties-impact-19653647.htm]]></link>
      <description><![CDATA[India and China are set to resume direct passenger flights after five years, a move expected to boost trade, tourism, and economic ties. The resumption comes amid growing diplomatic engagement, recent trade approvals, and ahead of Prime Minister Modi’s visit to China for the SCO Summit. Pre-pandemic, over 8 lakh passengers traveled annually between the two countries, with cargo flows also significant. Restoring direct flights is likely to reignite strong demand, supporting business, tourism, and people-to-people exchanges.]]></description>
      <pubDate><![CDATA[Wed, 13 Aug 2025 23:52:07 +0530]]></pubDate>
      <dc:creator>Swapnil Deshpande</dc:creator>

    </item>

      <link><![CDATA[https://www.cnbctv18.com/business/aviation/pilot-poaching-is-indias-request-valid-19653640.htm]]></link>
      <description><![CDATA[On average in India, a senior First Officer earns about ₹5 lakh a month. At Emirates or Etihad, it’s ₹10 lakh rupees, tax-free, plus free housing and free schooling for up to 3 children. In the US, the same job can get you ₹17 lakh a month.       <link><![CDATA[https://www.cnbctv18.com/economy/india-ibc-reforms-functional-framework-courts-experts-19653521.htm]]></link>
      <description><![CDATA[Experts say proposed changes to the Insolvency and Bankruptcy Code will only work if backed by a functional framework, not left to court-driven resolutions.       <title><![CDATA[Dashverse to invest $13 million Series A funding in AI R&D to build India’s leading creator ecosystem]]></title>
      <link><![CDATA[https://www.cnbctv18.com/business/startup/dashverse-series-a-funding-ai-powered-tools-dashreels-creator-ecosystem-india-19652864.htm]]></link>
      <description><![CDATA[Dashverse, an AI-driven entertainment startup, is set to invest 60-70% of its recent $13 million Series A funding into advanced AI research and development. With its microdrama app Dashreels surpassing 5 million downloads in just a month and ranking third on the Google Play Store, the company aims to build India’s leading AI creator ecosystem. CEO Sanidhya Narain highlighted the goal of delivering seamless storytelling through AI, tackling challenges like character consistency. Beyond consumer apps, Dashverse also offers AI-powered tools to help creators produce serialised content, aiming to democratise content creation via a thriving two-sided marketplace.]]></description>

      <description><![CDATA[The federal finance ministry has proposed to provide 10%-15% credit guarantees to banks for advancing loans to stressed small businesses, with turnover up to 5 billion rupees, that fall under the Reserve Bank of India’s (RBI) so-called special mention accounts (SMA), the sources said. ]]></description>

      <description><![CDATA[Mosaic said rising prices for phosphate and potash, another key fertiliser, boosted second-quarter net potash sales up from the prior year, while offsetting lower phosphate volumes to keep sales flat.       <description><![CDATA[The group’s crown jewel, Tata Consultancy Services (TCS), has been the biggest casualty, losing nearly $70 billion in market value since September last year. Tata Motors is the second-largest contributor to the group’s market cap erosion, with a decline of around $21 billion. Together, these two companies account for nearly 75% of the total erosion in market value over the past year.]]></description>
